title: Home
text:
Welcome! This mentoring workshop (and the mentoring community that it seeds) is the result of concerted effort on the part of many LTER Network researchers and staff. Over the past few years, a handful of early-adopters have sought training in facilitation via the Entering Mentoring curriculum and begun offering the workshop at their sites.
You should have been prompted to register through Zoom when you registered, but if not, please reach out to Molly Phillips and she can help.
